metadata.description: Set of key-value pairs that you can attach to an object. This can be useful for storing additional information about the object in a structured format.

name.description: The collections name. Contract symbol will be created based on this.

network.description: The blockchain network to deploy the contract to.

symbol.description: The collections name. Contract symbol will be created based on this.

type.description: The type of contract to create. As of now, only semi_fungible_token is supported
